evidence.text:

• clarifying that the pressure vessel Provisions tables (Table 3 to subpart F
requirements at 40 CFR 63.119(a)(7) 1. NESHAP of part 63 and Table 1 to subpart W of
only apply to pressure vessels that are We are finalizing the proposed part 63, respectively) to eliminate

This snippet contains no statement of compliance or non‑compliance, indicating that no monitor report is present.
